summary: On a small South Pacific island during WW2, various US Navy P.R. personnel pass the time romancing the nurses and the native girls while trying to avoid front line Sea Duty.
cast: Glenn Ford|Gia Scala|Earl Holliman|Anne Francis|Keenan Wynn|Fred Clark|Eva Gabor|Russ Tamblyn|Jeff Richards|Mickey Shaughnessy|Howard Smith|Romney Brent|Mary Wickes|Jack Straw|Robert Nichols|John Alderson|Jack Albertson|Charles Watts|Don Anderson|Hugh Boswell|Tex Brodus|Lowell Brown|Paul Bryar|Don Burnett|John Cason|Jerado Decordovier|John Dennis|Harry Denny|Ken DuMain|Raoul Freeman|Richard Gardner|Ike Gibson|James Gonzalez|Shep Houghton|William Joyce|Mailoa Kalili|'King Kong' Kashey|Carey Loftin|Gregg Martell|Tom Mayton|Murray Pollack|Jose Portugal|Julian Rivero|John Roy|David Sharpe|Mike Steen|Audrey Swanson|Arthur Tovey|Steve Warren|Wilson Wood
keywords: island|south pacific|world war two|u.s. navy|based on novel
title: Vaya marineros
